text: Tara apanara kache naridera bibahera anumati caya. Bale dinah allaha tomaderake tadera samparke anumati dena ebam kora'ane tomaderake ya ya pata kare sunano haya, ta ai saba pitrhina-naridera bidhana, yadera ke tomara nirdharita adhikara pradana kara na athaca bibaha bandhane abad'dha karara basana rakha. Ara aksama sisudera bidhana e'i ye, etimadera jan'ye inasaphera upara kayema thaka. Tomara ya bhala kaja karabe, ta allaha janena.
